summary.span: 定义连接点对象，该对象允许服务器控件作为提供者，以形成与使用者的连接。

span.span: Defines a connection point object that enables a server control acting as a provider to form a connection with a consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在两个服务器控件之间的每个 Web 部件连接中，每个控件都必须具有) 关联连接点对象的其他要求 (，使其能够连接到其他控件并提供或使用数据，具体取决于控件是否被指定为连接的提供者或使用者。In every Web Parts connection between two server controls, each control must have (among other requirements) an associated connection point object that enables it to connect to the other control and to either provide or consume data, depending on whether the control is designated as the provider or consumer for the connection. 对象通常包含有关控件如何连接到其他控件的详细信息以及它可以共享的数据类型的详细信息。A object in general contains the details for how a control can connect to another control and the type of data it can share. 对于在连接中充当提供者的控件，其连接点必须是 对象。For a control acting as the provider in a connection, its connection point must be a object. 有关 Web 部件连接和连接点的详细信息，请参阅下面的 "另请参阅" 部分中列出的主题。For details on Web Parts connections and connection points, see the topics listed in the See Also section below. 若要创建 对象，需要执行多个步骤：To create a object, several steps are required: 1. 创建接口。Create an interface. 当提供程序与使用者共享数据时，它通过获取接口的实例并将该实例返回到使用者来实现。When a provider shares data with a consumer, it does so by getting an instance of an interface, and returning that instance to a consumer. 2. 在提供程序中实现接口。Implement the interface in a provider. 或其他服务器控件 (可以使用区域中任何类型的服务器控件 ，) 该访问接口必须实现第一步中创建的接口。A or other server control (any type of server control in a zone can be used) that will be the provider must implement the interface created in the first step. 3. 标识回调方法。Identify a callback method. 必须将提供程序中的方法标识为回调方法以建立连接。A method in the provider must be identified as the callback method to establish a connection. 此方法会将实现的接口实例返回给使用者。This method returns an instance of the implemented interface to a consumer. 在提供程序中标识回调方法的 Web 部件方法是将 `ConnectionProvider` 类定义的元数据属性 () 添加 到返回接口实例的方法。The Web Parts approach for identifying a callback method in the provider is to add a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute (defined by the class) to the method that returns the interface instance. 添加属性后，唯一必需的参数是用于提供程序连接点的显示名称。When the attribute is added, the only required parameter is a display name to use for the provider connection point. 还可以添加可选参数，例如连接点的 ID。Optional parameters can also be added, such as an ID for the connection point. 将控件作为提供者提供后，该控件可以参与连接 (假设使用者控件具有类似的装备并且可用) 。After a control has been equipped to act as a provider, the control can participate in connections (assuming that a consumer control is similarly equipped and available). 若要在网页的标记中创建静态的声明性连接，开发人员可以使用 `` 元素。To create a static, declarative connection in the markup of a Web page, developers can use the `` element. 如果用于 `ConnectionProvider` 标识回调方法的提供程序源代码中的属性指定了连接点的 ID，则必须将该值分配给 `ProviderConnectionPointID` 页面上的元素中的属性 `` 。If the `ConnectionProvider` attribute in the provider source code that identifies the callback method specifies an ID for the connection point, then that value must be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element on a page. 开发人员为提供者连接点指定 ID 的一个原因是，提供程序控件中有多个连接点。One reason that a developer might specify an ID for a provider connection point is if there are multiple connection points in the provider control. 如果没有为提供程序控件中的提供程序连接点指定 ID，则无需将值分配给 `ProviderConnectionPointID` 页中的属性，这是因为将使用从该字段获取的默认值创建连接 。If an ID is not specified for the provider connection point in the provider control, a value does not have to be assigned to the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the page either, because the connection will be created using a default value obtained from the field. 若要在代码中创建连接，开发人员必须 通过调用 方法并向其传递提供程序控件的 id 和 提供程序控件中的已定义对象的 id 或索引，来创建一个新的对象。To create a connection in code, developers must create a new object by calling the method and passing to it the ID of the provider control, along with the ID or index of the defined object in the provider control. 返回的 对象以及对提供程序控件的引用、对使用者控件的引用以及对应的 对象都被传递给 方法以创建新的 对象。The returned object, along with a reference to the provider control, a reference to the consumer control, and a corresponding object, are all passed to the method to create a new object. 尽管开发人员可以使用提供程序连接点作为以声明方式或以编程方式建立连接的一部分，但用户也可以与提供程序连接点进行交互以通过用户界面 (UI) 建立连接。Although developers can use provider connection points as part of establishing connections either declaratively or programmatically, users can also interact with provider connection points to establish connections through the user interface (UI). 如果开发人员在网页上声明了一个 控件，则该控件将提供运行时 UI，使用户能够创建连接。If developers declare a control on a Web page, it provides a run-time UI for users to create connections. 如果用户选择使用者控件作为建立连接的起点，请单击其连接谓词 (它们也可以选择提供程序;生成的连接) 没有任何区别，在 UI 中，他们将看到一个下拉列表控件，其中包含可用提供程序连接点的显示名称 (或点（如果有多个) 。If users choose the consumer control as the starting point for establishing the connection by clicking its connect verb (they could also choose the provider; there is no difference in the resulting connection), in the UI they will see a drop-down list control with the display name of the available provider connection point (or points if there are multiple ones). 用户必须选择提供程序连接点才能创建连接。Users must select a provider connection point to create a connection. 对象直接与特定提供程序控件关联，并将有关连接的详细信息存储在它从基类继承的属性中 。A object associates directly with a specific provider control, and stores details about a connection in the properties it inherits from the base class. 例如，在继承的 属性中，提供程序连接点保留提供程序返回的接口类型。For example, in the inherited property, a provider connection point keeps the type of interface returned by the provider. 如果连接中的提供者和使用者均使用相同的接口类型，则这些控件是兼容的，并且能够形成直接连接。If the provider and consumer in a connection both work with the same interface type, the controls are compatible and capable of forming a direct connection. 如果提供程序和使用者无法使用同一接口类型，则它们是不兼容的，并且必须使用 对象将提供程序连接点的 值转换为使用者可以使用的类型。If the provider and consumer cannot work with the same interface type, they are incompatible and must use a object to translate the provider connection point's value into a type that the consumer can work with. 另一个重要的继承属性是 属性，它提供在用户界面中显示的友好名称，以便用户在创建连接时选择提供者连接点。Another important inherited property is the property, which provides a friendly name to display in the UI for users to choose a provider connection point when creating connections. 当开发人员将 `ConnectionProvider` 特性添加到提供程序控件中的回调方法时，显示名称是必需的参数。The display name is the required parameter when developers add a `ConnectionProvider` attribute to the callback method in a provider control. 正如上面所述，继承的属性也很有用，因为当提供程序具有多个连接点时，它为提供程序连接点提供唯一标识符。The inherited property is also useful, as indicated above, because it provides a unique identifier for a provider connection point in the event that a provider has multiple connection points. 提供程序中可以有多个 定义的对象，在这种情况下，当开发人员将 `ConnectionProvider` 特性添加到方法时，应指定一个 ID 值以区分每个连接点。A provider can have multiple objects defined in it, and in this case, when developers add the `ConnectionProvider` attribute to a method, they should specify an ID value to distinguish each connection point. 另一个值得注意的继承属性是 属性，该属性指示提供程序连接点是否可以同时连接到多个使用者。One other notable inherited property is the property, which indicates whether a provider connection point can connect simultaneously to multiple consumers. 默认情况下，此属性值 `true` (提供程序连接点，而默认为 `false` 用于) 使用者连接点。This property value is `true` by default for provider connection points (whereas it defaults to `false` for consumer connection points). 类将几个唯一方法添加到它从类继承的成员 。The class adds several unique methods to the members it inherits from the class. 方法检索回调方法将返回给使用者的接口实例。The method retrieves an instance of the interface that the callback method will return to consumers. 方法检索属于现有连接的其他使用者接口，但不是用于建立连接的接口。The method retrieves additional consumer interfaces that are part of an existing connection, but are not the interfaces used to establish the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了使用提供者连接点的每种情况下，以声明方式、编程方式或通过 UI 创建连接的简单方法。The following code example shows simple ways to create a connection declaratively, programmatically, or through the UI, in each case making use of a provider connection point. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 允许您在页上更改 Web 部件显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change the Web Parts display mode on a page. - 接口的源代码和两个用作 连接的提供者和使用者的控件。Source code for an interface and two controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection. - 承载所有控件并运行代码示例的网页。A Web page to host all the controls and run the code example. - 有关如何运行 "示例" 页的说明。An explanation of how to run the example page. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 将以下源代码保存到 .ascx 文件，并为其提供分配给 `Src` 此用户控件的指令属性的文件名，该属性 `Register` 位于宿主网页的顶部附近。Save the following source code to an .ascx file, giving it the file name that is assigned to the `Src` attribute of the `Register` directive for this user control, which is near the top of the hosting Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] 此代码示例的第二部分是接口和控件的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for the interface and controls. 源文件包含一个名为的简单接口 `IZipCode` 。The source file contains a simple interface named `IZipCode`. 还有一个 名为的类 `ZipCodeWebPart` ，该类实现接口并充当提供程序控件。There is also a class named `ZipCodeWebPart` that implements the interface and acts as the provider control. 它 `ProvideIZipCode` 的方法是实现接口的唯一成员的回调方法。Its `ProvideIZipCode` method is the callback method that implements the interface's only member. 方法只返回接口的实例。The method simply returns an instance of the interface. 请注意，该方法 `ConnectionProvider` 在其元数据中用特性标记。Note that the method is marked with a `ConnectionProvider` attribute in its metadata. 这是将方法标识为提供程序连接点的回调方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the method as the callback method for the provider's connection point. 其他 类命名为 `WeatherWebPart` ，它充当连接的使用者。The other class is named `WeatherWebPart`, and it acts as the consumer for the connection. 此类具有一个名为 `GetZipCode` 的方法，该方法 `IZipCode` 从提供程序控件获取接口的实例。This class has a method named `GetZipCode` that gets an instance of the `IZipCode` interface from the provider control. 请注意，此方法 `ConnectionConsumer` 在其元数据中被标记为使用者的连接点方法和属性。Note that this method is marked as the consumer's connection point method with a `ConnectionConsumer` attribute in its metadata. 这是用于标识使用者控件中的连接点方法的机制。This is the mechanism for identifying the connection point method in the consumer control. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 顶部附近是 `Register` 注册构成连接的自定义控件的指令，以及允许用户在页面上更改显示模式的用户控件。Near the top are `Register` directives to register the custom controls that form the connection, and the user control that enables users to change display modes on the page. 连接本身是在页面上的元素中以声明方式创建的 `` 。The connection itself is created declaratively within the `` element on the page. 这说明了创建连接的一种方法--请注意 `ProviderConnectionPointID` 元素中的属性 `` 。This demonstrates one way of creating a connection--note the `ProviderConnectionPointID` attribute in the `` element. 还可以通过编程方式创建连接;用于执行此操作的代码位于 `Button1_Click` 方法中。You can also create the connection programmatically; the code for doing that is in the `Button1_Click` method. 在这种情况下，将 创建一个对象，然后将该对象传递给创建实际连接的方法。In this case, a object is created and then passed to a method that creates the actual connection. 无论连接是以声明方式创建还是以编程方式创建，都必须始终为提供程序和使用者指定连接点。Whether the connection is created declaratively or programmatically, connection points must always be specified for both the provider and the consumer. `Button2_Click`方法访问 提供程序和使用者的对象，并将其一些属性值写入页中的标签。The `Button2_Click` method accesses the objects for both the provider and the consumer, and writes some of their property values to a label in the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/CS/connectionPointCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ConnectionPoint_Overview/VB/connectionPointVB.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，单击 " **连接点详细信息** " 按钮。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connection Point Details** button. 此时将显示有关在声明性连接中建立的提供者和使用者连接点的信息。Information about the provider and consumer connection points established in the declarative connection appears. 接下来，使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉控件将页面切换到连接模式。Next, use the **Display Mode** drop-down control to switch the page into connect mode. 在**ZIP 代码使用者**控件的谓词菜单上 (用标题栏中的向下箭头表示) 中，单击 "连接" 谓词。On the verbs menu of the **ZIP Code Consumer** control (represented by a downward arrow in the title bar), click the connect verb. 连接 UI 随即出现，由 `` 页面中声明的控件自动创建。The connection UI appears, created automatically by the `` control declared in the page. 这是通过 UI) 创建连接 (的另一种方式，还包括前面讨论的声明性和编程方法。This is another way of creating a connection (through the UI), along with the declarative and programmatic methods discussed earlier. 单击 " **断开连接** " 按钮以终止现有静态连接。Click the **Disconnect** button to terminate the existing static connection. 单击 " **创建与提供程序的连接** " 链接。Click the **Create a Connection to a Provider** link. UI 现在会显示一个下拉列表控件，其中列出了提供者连接点显示名称。The UI now displays a drop-down control that lists the provider connection point display name. 在下拉列表中选择连接点，然后单击 " **连接** " 以完成连接。Select the connection point in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection. 接下来，再次单击 " **断开** "。Next, click **Disconnect** again. 然后，单击 " **动态连接** " 按钮以编程方式创建连接。Then, click the **Dynamic Connection** button to create a connection programmatically. 使用 " **显示模式** " 控件将页面返回到浏览模式。Use the **Display Mode** control to return the page to browse mode. 再次单击 " **连接点详细信息** " 按钮，以进一步指出提供者连接点对象的详细信息。Click the **Connection Point Details** button again, to once more indicate details about the provider connection point object. 该示例演示了如何建立连接并以三种方式使用提供程序连接点：在网页标记中声明的静态连接;在使用对象的代码中创建的连接; 通过连接 UI 创建的连接 。The example has demonstrated establishing a connection and using a provider connection point in three ways: a static connection declared in the Web page markup; a connection created in code that used a object; and a connection created by a user through the connection UI.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Connections Overview

param.name: callbackMethod
param.span: 提供者控件中的方法，该方法将接口实例返回给使用者以建立连接。

span.span: The method in the provider control that returns an interface instance to consumers to establish a connection.

param.name: interfaceType
param.span: 提供者提供给使用者的接口的 。

span.span: The of the interface that the provider serves to consumers.

param.name: controlType
param.span: 与提供者连接点相关联的提供者控件的 。

span.span: The of the provider control with which the provider connection point is associated.

span.span: A friendly display name for the provider connection point that appears to users in the connection user interface (UI).

param.span: 提供者连接点的唯一标识符。

span.span: A unique identifier for the provider connection point.

param.name: allowsMultipleConnections
param.span: 一个布尔值，指示提供者连接点是否可以同时与多个使用者保持连接。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating whether the provider connection point can have multiple simultaneous connections with consumers.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数 只调用基构造函数，并向其传递各种参数和初始化基类。The constructor for the class simply calls the base constructor, passing to it the various parameters and initializing the base class. 基类构造函数检查连接点的多个参数，并可能引发多个异常。The base class constructor checks a number of the parameters for a connection point and can throw several exceptions. 有关可能的异常的列表，请参阅异常部分。For a list of possible exceptions, see the Exceptions section. 您可以调用 构造函数来创建您自己的类的实例 。You can call the constructor to create your own instance of the class. 但是，如果你只是建立连接而不是扩展类，则应调用 方法从提供程序返回现有连接点对象。However, in cases where you are simply establishing a connection and not extending the class, you should call the method to return an existing connection point object from a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生以创建自定义提供程序连接点。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom provider connection point. 此代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 一个源文件，其中包含提供程序 控件、使用者 控件和自定义 对象。A source file that contains a provider control, a consumer control, and a custom object. - 承载静态连接中的控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the controls in a static connection. - 说明如何运行示例代码。An explanation of how to run the example code. 此代码示例的第一部分是提供程序和使用者控件的源以及 一个名为的自定义 类 `TableProviderConnectionPoint` 。The first part of the code example is the source for the provider and consumer controls, and a custom class, named `TableProviderConnectionPoint`. 请注意，类的构造函数 `TableProviderConnectionPoint` 调用基构造函数，并向其传递所需的参数（如 parameters 节中所述）。Note that the constructor of the `TableProviderConnectionPoint` class calls the base constructor, passing it the required parameters as indicated in the Parameters section. 另请注意，在 `TableProviderWebPart` 类中， `GetConnectionInterface` 方法被指定为连接的回调方法，而特性将 `ConnectionProvider` 自定义声明 `TableProviderConnectionPoint` 为参数。Also note that in the `TableProviderWebPart` class, the `GetConnectionInterface` method is specified as the callback method for connections, and the `ConnectionProvider` attribute declares the custom `TableProviderConnectionPoint` as a parameter. 这说明了如何创建自定义提供程序连接点，然后将其与提供程序控件关联。This demonstrates how to create a custom provider connection point and then associate it with a provider control. 此示例假设源代码是动态编译的，因此应将源代码文件放在 Web 应用程序的 App_Code 子文件夹中。This example assumes that the source code is dynamically compiled, so you should place the source code file in an App_Code subfolder of your Web application. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/connectionControls.cs#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是在静态 Web 部件连接中承载自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom controls in a static Web Parts connection. 页面顶部是一个 `Register` 指令，用于声明自定义控件的前缀和命名空间。At the top of the page is a `Register` directive to declare a prefix and the namespace for the custom controls. 通过使用元素来声明连接 `` ，并在元素中声明提供程序和使用者控件 `` 。The connection is declared by using an `` element, and the provider and consumer controls are declared within an `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 控件之间的连接已存在，使用者将显示来自提供程序的数据，因为连接已在页中声明为静态连接。The connection between the controls already exists, and the consumer displays the data from the provider, because the connection was declared as a static connection in the page.

is or an empty string ("").

exception.span: 与提供程序控件（或从提供程序控件派生的有效类）的类型不同。

span.span: is not the same type as the provider control (or a valid class derived from it).
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetObject(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetObject (control As Control) As Object
abstract member GetObject : System.Web.UI.Control -> obj override this.GetObject : System.Web.UI.Control -> obj

param.name: control
param.span: 在 Web 部件连接中用作提供者的控件。

span.span: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.

summary.span: 调用提供者控件中的回调方法，该方法获取一个接口实例以便返回给使用者。

span.span: Invokes the callback method in a provider control that gets an interface instance to return to consumers.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是提供者返回给使用者的接口实例，该接口用于建立连接。

span.span: An that is an instance of the interface a provider returns to consumers to establish a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从提供程序控件返回一个对象，该对象是用于建立连接的接口的实例。This method returns an object from the provider control that is an instance of the interface used to establish a connection. 对象的类型将为实现接口的类型。The type of the object will be the type of the implemented interface. 例如，为 Web 部件控件集中的连接实现的两个接口为 和 。For example, two interfaces that are implemented for connections in the Web Parts control set are and . 对 对象调用方法时 ，如果关联的提供程序实现其中一个接口，则返回的对象将具有相同的类型。When the method is called on a object, if the associated provider implements one of these interfaces, the returned object will be of the same type. 当连接处于激活状态时，对象将调用方法。The method is called by objects when a connection is being activated. 这是实际启动连接并开始使两个控件共享数据的过程的关键步骤。This is a critical step that actually initiates a connection and begins the process that enables two controls to share data. 连接中的使用者控件必须能够使用与提供程序相同的接口类型。The consumer control in a connection must be able to work with the same type of interface as the provider. 如果不是，则控件不兼容，并且 必须使用对象来建立连接。If it does not, the controls are incompatible and a object must be used to establish a connection.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection GetSecondaryInterfaces(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetSecondaryInterfaces (control As Control) As ConnectionInterfaceCollection

abstract member GetSecondaryInterfaces : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection override this.GetSecondaryInterfaces : System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionInterfaceCollection

param.name: control
param.span: 在 Web 部件连接中用作提供者的控件。

span.span: The control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection.

summary.span: 获取受提供者连接点支持的辅助接口的可选集合。

span.span: Gets an optional collection of secondary interfaces that can be supported by a provider connection point.

returns.span: 其他接口的 ，这些接口由用作提供者的控件提供。

span.span: A of additional interfaces provided by the control acting as a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序连接点对象始终具有用于与使用者建立连接的默认接口。A provider connection point object always has a default interface that is used to establish a connection with consumers. 通过对对象调用方法来检索默认接口的实例 。An instance of the default interface is retrieved by calling the method on a object. 但是，某些提供程序控件将实现多个接口，以便作为连接的一部分提供给使用者。However, some provider controls will implement multiple interfaces to provide to consumers as part of a connection. 这些接口（不是用于建立连接的默认接口）称为 "辅助接口"。These interfaces, which are not the default ones used to establish a connection, are called secondary interfaces. 方法提供了一种方法，可返回对辅助接口的引用集合，就像 方法返回对默认接口的引用一样。The method provides a way to return a collection of references to the secondary interfaces, just as the method returns a reference to the default interface.

para.span: 类中的方法 不包含实现，它返回一个空的辅助接口集合。

span.span: The method in the class contains no implementation; it returns an empty collection of secondary interfaces.

para.span: 若要实现此方法，您必须从 类继承，并重写此方法，从它返回一组特定的辅助接口。

span.span: To implement this method, you must inherit from the class, and override this method, returning from it a specific set of secondary interfaces.
